nat.STEP_CLIENT_INFORMATION: Please provide the following information about the client:
nat.STEP_CLIENT_SUBJECT_TO_TAXATION: Is the client subject to taxation in Austria?
nat.STEP_SELECT_COUNTRY_FOR_TAXATION: Please indicate in which country the client is subject to taxation.
nat.STEP_WHAT_LEGAL_SERVICES: What kind of legal services will be provided?
nat.STEP_PEP: Do any of the following persons qualify as a politically exposed person (PEP)?
nat.PURCHASE_OR_SALE_OF_REAL_ESTATE: The purchase or sale of real estate or companies
nat.ADMINISTRATION_OF_MONEY: The administration of money, securities or other assets (e.g., digital assets), the opening or administration of bank, savings or securities accounts
nat.FORMATION_OR_OPERATION_OR_ADMINISTRATION: The formation, operation or administration of any trust, company, foundation or similar structure, including raising the funds necessary for the formation, operation or administration of companies (e.g., ICOs/STOs)
nat.LEGAL_SERVICES_FOR_CLIENT_OR_SOMEONE_ELS: Will the legal services be provided for the client or on behalf of someone else?
